title: Autorite des Marches Financiers (FR)
body:
**Name:** Autorite des Marches Financiers (FR)

**Country:** FR

**Link:** https://www.data.gouv.fr/datasets

**Extra link:** Autorité des marchés financiers (AMF): Protection of savings, Investors' information and proper functioning of financial markets | AMF



The AMF regulates the French financial market and works to ensure that financial markets are robust, protective and useful to the economy.

For searching the registers, go to "Jeux de données" and enter the type of organisation, for example "sociétés de gestion de portefeuille". You will enter a page where you can download a CSV file with the names of the registered entities.

Companies that are under their supervision are a.o.:

Investment Management companies
Professional Investors
FinTech
Investment Services providers
